sn46.15:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn46.15:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn46.15:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn46.15:4.5: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.15:5.2: Kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn46.15:5.5: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn46.15:6.1: “Sattime, moggallāna, bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
sn46.15:6.3: Satisambojjhaṅgo kho, moggallāna, mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati … pe …
sn46.15:6.4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo kho, moggallāna, mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn46.15:6.5: Ime kho, moggallāna, satta bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
sn46.15:7.2: Attamano āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn46.15:7.4: Tathāpahīno cāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa so ābādho ahosīti.
